question:
[Judy] went to the store with her sister [Michele] [Martin] loved going to the store with his mom [Ethel]. She always bought him snacks [Larry] took his son [Martin] and daughter [Leila] to the zoo on Saturday and they had a great time. [Dana] went to her son [Joseph]'s House [Freddie] asked his aunt, [Michele], to read him a story. [Michele] unfortunately was n't able to, since she did n't have her glasses, and she was almost blind without them. [Freddie] bought to dress for his father [Joseph] [Martin] invited his mother [Ethel] and grandmother [Dana] over for dinner.
Question: How is [Judy] related to [Leila]?
